name: Camp the fire
description:
You need to protect your Campfire!

You can craft items in the crafting table, but for that you need to farm items first!

Controls

- w a s d: move

- mouse: selecting stuff

Tips:

- to get out of the crafting table you need to hit it again

- a wall can only have 2 more walls

- zombies spawn in waves

- you can not build while using the tool slot
